data.title: Derby city poop scoop
data.meta_description: Locally Owned Dog Waste Removal services servicing Louisville & Southern Indiana Starts as low at $14.99 a week
data.text:
We require Auto-pay feature for your convenience. With Auto-pay, you can choose to make payments either weekly After the scoop or at the end of each billing cycle.

Auto-payments will be deducted according to your preference on the 1st or 15th of each month, during the night after the end of the business day. Receipts / invoices will be emailed to you.

Billing statements will be sent via email on either the 1st or the 15th of each month,

To ensure complete satisfaction, customers will not be charged until after services have been completed. Billing charges will be determined by the number of visits during the previous monthly cycle, which typically spans 4 or 5 weeks.

Payments are due within 15 days of receipt of the billing statement. A late fee of 7% of the outstanding balance will be applied on the 15th/1st of the month for accounts with unpaid balances. Services will be suspended on this date until payment is received. Accounts that remain delinquent for over 45 days will incur a $45 collection fee and be referred to collections.

We accept payments via credit cards and debit cards only. Please note that as of October 1st, 2021, we no longer accept paper checks. Additionally, there is a $2.50 charge for processing credit card payments over the phone.

For your convenience, please use the provided link in the invoice email to make payments promptly.

For our guarantee to be effective, the area to be serviced must be clear of excessively tall grass, leaves, snow, and debris. While our team endeavors to ensure your yard is impeccably clean, it's important to note that our pooper scoopers can only clean what is visible. If there are concerns regarding visibility in your yard, we'll promptly notify you.

Ready to get started? Simply reach out to us via call or text, and we'll gladly address any further inquiries you may have. There are no binding contracts involved; our service operates on a week-by-week basis.

To initiate the process, we'll send you a waiver via email for access permission, and once signed, you're all set!

With our Money Back Satisfaction Guarantee, you truly have nothing to lose except for the waste!

Do you need to be present for the initial appointment? Not necessarily. However, we do have some essential documents for you to review and a Quote to sign, which we'll send via email. If your dogs will be outdoors during our visit, we kindly request your presence for their introduction to our team.

Discover What We Offer!

Derby City Poop Scoop is your trusted local pet waste removal service, catering to over 1200 yards each week across 12 counties. We provide flexible options, including twice a week, weekly, and once a week services, tailored to meet your specific requirements!

Currently, we extend our services to the following areas:

Southern Indiana

Jefferson County

Oldham County

Shepherdsville

Simpsonville

Shelbyville

Mt. Washington

Fisherville/Taylorsville

Hardin County

Elizabethtown

Radcliff

Vine Grove

Lexington

Frankfort

Bardstown

Lawrenceberg

Georgetown KY

Ft. Knox, and neighboring cities!

Don't find your town listed? Reach out to us, and we'll work on including your area in our expanding service network.

At Derby City Poop Scoop, we believe in flexibility, which is why we don't bind you with contracts. Our service operates on a week-by-week basis (refer to the agreement for termination procedures).

Here's What to Expect:

We stick to the same day each week for your convenience, eliminating the need to wonder about your service day.

Prior to arrival, we'll send you a text notification.

On the scheduled day, a clearly marked, uniformed vehicle will arrive at your property.

Our dedicated scooper will meticulously remove all pet waste from your yard and dispose of it in accordance with state and county regulations.

Upon completion, you'll receive an email confirming the service.

Invoices detailing the services provided over the previous 30 days will be emailed at the end of each month, with payment due by the 15th of the following month.

DERBY CITY POOP SCOOP bears no responsibility for damages to yards, gates, pets, or other properties.

Fees and promotions are subject to change at our discretion. In the rare event of such changes, we will provide you with at least one (1) week's notice beforehand.

Either party has the right to terminate the service at any time. To request termination, please email info@derbycitypoopscoop.com or text/call 502-509-3314.

Unpaid balances must be settled within 15 days.

Are we insured? Absolutely! We carry a $1 million liability policy.

We prioritize hygiene by sanitizing our shoes and equipment after each cleaning session. We utilize Top Performance 512 Disinfectants, known for their superior concentration and effectiveness. This potent formula eliminates a wide range of pathogens, including staph, salmonella, E. coli, canine parvovirus, and more.

Trusted by kennels, veterinary clinics, and grooming shops worldwide, our disinfectants contain active ingredients such as Didecyl dimethyl ammonium chloride and dimethyl benzyl ammonium chloride, ensuring thorough sanitation and area control.

For pet waste removal services in Louisville, trust Derby City Poop Scoop
